Default SearchDropDown:

```js
<SearchDropDown
  name="disease"
  options={[{ label: "label1", value: "value1" }, { label: "label2", value: "value2" }, { label: "label3", value: "value3" }]}
  onSearch={() => {}}
  onSelect={() => {}}
  onChange={() => {}}
/>
```

SearchDropDown with placeholder

```js
<SearchDropDown
  name="disease"
  options={[{ label: "label1", value: "value1" }, { label: "label2", value: "value2" }, { label: "label3", value: "value3" }]}
  onSearch={() => {}}
  onSelect={() => {}}
  onChange={() => {}}
  placeholder="Enter disease"
/>
```

With selectedOption SearchDropDown:

```js
<SearchDropDown
  name="disease"
  options={[{ label: "label1", value: "value1" }, { label: "label2", value: "value2" }, { label: "label3", value: "value3" }]}
  selectedOption={{ label: "label2", value: "value2" }}
  onSearch={() => {}}
  onSelect={() => {}}
  onChange={() => {}}
/>
```

SearchDropDown (disabled state):

```js
<SearchDropDown
  name="disease"
  options={[{ label: "label1", value: "value1" }, { label: "label2", value: "value2" }, { label: "label3", value: "value3" }]}
  selectedOption={{ label: "label2", value: "value2" }}
  onSearch={() => {}}
  onSelect={() => {}}
  onChange={() => {}}
  disabled
/>
```

With error SearchDropDown:

```js
<div className="bg-search-drop-down-wrapper--error">
  <SearchDropDown
    name="disease"
    options={[{ label: "label1", value: "value1" }, { label: "label2", value: "value2" }, { label: "label3", value: "value3" }]}
    onSearch={() => {}}
    onSelect={() => {}}
    onChange={() => {}}
  />
</div>
```
